purchase orders linked to sales orders Sales Order Lookup by Customer PO
section.para: To view Sales Orders by Customer Purchase Order, select the "Sales Order Lookup by Customer PO" option from the "Displays" menu. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Sales Order Lookup by Customer PO

section.para: When displaying Sales Orders by Customer Purchase Order, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter an Order Number or Regular Expression. The display will show Sales Orders associated with the specified Purchase Order Number(s).

tip.para: The "PO Number" field supports pattern matching with Regular Expressions.

listitem.para: Sales Orders entered on and after this date will be displayed.
